board.name: slug
board.test: Power up the slug (without usb/network), check that it doesn't current-limit
Power up again, this time with 2usb sticks (root and user keys)
Kill existing xbd and pyenv (python) instances.
Reset the xbee module from within python (using the xbee_reset() function in the power.py module)

Run the following:
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/lib xbd -s /dev/ttyS0
xbd *must* determine the address of the connected xbee. Output will be along the lines of this: ** (xbd:660): DEBUG: Setting baud to 9600 ** (xbd:660): DEBUG: In AT mode. ** (xbd:660): DEBUG: Setting baud to 9600 ** (xbd:660): DEBUG: xbee in API mode ** (xbd:660): DEBUG: Local address: 0013A2004008AC9A
